title: We Wasted TOO MUCH on Mystery Tech...
description: One day we're finally going to cancel Mystery Tech. Mystery Tech Went TOO FAR   Sega Genesis Mini on Amazon:  This ridiculously expensive toaster on Amazon:  The MovieMask:  I couldn't find a link to the anime headphones or the "GameSphere" but let's be real that's ok.  By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
